title: Provided further that if development of cinema/theater along-with other uses except residential use is proposed in single building then the open space requirement shall be considered as required for the special building
clause_text: Provided further that if development of cinema/theater along-with other uses except residential use is proposed in single building then the open space requirement shall be considered as required for the special building. The residential uses shall be permitted in separate building/separate wing with separate access.
